product_name: CamelBak Skeeter Hydration Pack - 50 fl. oz. - Kids'
long_description: The CamelBak Skeeter hydration pack keeps young riders hydrated as they run their 2-wheelers through their paces. Wicking mesh back panel and mesh shoulder straps are cool and comfortable; shoulder straps fit and adjust for riders 5 yrs. old and up. Antidote(TM) wide-mouth 50 fl. oz. reservoir sports a handle and is easy to fill. Big Bite(TM) valve is easy to use-just bite and sip; HydroLock(TM) valve shuts off water, ensuring leak-free transport. Reflective highlights increase visibility in low light. Please note: wash the CamelBak Skeeter hydration pack reservoir after each use.
short_description: The CamelBak Skeeter hydration pack keeps young riders hydrated as they run their 2-wheelers through their paces.
